Cube.name: Daily SE Sales DBH SKU wise

CalculatedMember.name: Free SE Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Free SE Sales Volume]/1000

CalculatedMember.name: Net SE Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Net SE Sales Volume]/1000

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE Sales MT
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales Volume]/1000

CalculatedMember.name: Net SE Volume gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Volume])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Volume])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net SE Sales Volume])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Volume]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Volume]))

CalculatedMember.name: Net SE Unit gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Unit])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Unit])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net SE Sales Unit])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Unit]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Unit]))

CalculatedMember.name: Net SE CTN gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Ctn])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Ctn])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net SE Sales Ctn])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Ctn]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Ctn]))

CalculatedMember.name: Net SE Amount gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net SE Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free SE Volume gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Volume])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Volume])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free SE Sales Volume])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Volume]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Volume]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free SE Unit gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Unit])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Unit])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free SE Sales Unit])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Unit]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Unit]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free SE CTN gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Ctn])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Ctn])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free SE Sales Ctn])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Ctn]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Ctn]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free SE Amount gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free SE Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE Volume gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Volume])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Volume])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Volume])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Volume]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Volume]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE Unit gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Unit])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Unit])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Unit])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Unit]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Unit]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE CTN gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Ctn])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Ctn])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Ctn])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Ctn]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Ctn]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE Amount gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Amount])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Amount])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Amount])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Amount]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales Amount]))

CalculatedMember.name: Net Se Volume Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Net SE Sales Volume]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Net Se Unit Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Net SE Sales Unit]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Net Se CTN Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Net SE Sales Ctn]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Net Se Amount Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Net SE Sales Amount]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Free Se Volume Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Free SE Sales Volume]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Free Se Unit Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Free SE Sales Unit]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Free Se CTN Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Free SE Sales Ctn]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Free Se Amount Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Free SE Sales Amount]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Se Volume Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales Volume]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Se Unit Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales Unit]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE Sales Ctn Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales Ctn]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE Sales Amount Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales Amount]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Free Se Sales MT Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Free SE Sales MT]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Net Se Sales MT Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Net SE Sales MT]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Gross Se Sales MT Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales MT]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: Net SE MT gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Net SE Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Net SE Sales MT]))

CalculatedMember.name: Free SE MT gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Free SE Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Free SE Sales MT]))

CalculatedMember.name: Gross SE MT gr%
CalculatedMember.formula: Iif(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales MT])=0 OR IsEmpty(([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales MT])),0.0,(([Calendar].CURRENTMEMBER,Measures.[Gross SE Sales MT])-([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales MT]))/([Calendar].PrevMember,Measures.[Gross SE Sales MT]))

CalculatedMember.name: SE Volume Achievment
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales Volume]/[Measures].[Monthly Target Volume]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Volume MTD Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales Volume]/[Measures].[Daily Target Volume]

CalculatedMember.name: PR Volume Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR sales Volume]/[Measures].[Monthly Target Volume]

CalculatedMember.name: PR Volume MTD Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR sales Volume]/[Measures].[Daily Target Volume]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Volume Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales Volume]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Amount Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales Amount]/[Measures].[Monthly Target Amount]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Amount MTD Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales Amount]/[Measures].[Daily Target Amount]

CalculatedMember.name: PR Amount Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR sales Amount]/[Measures].[Monthly Target Amount]

CalculatedMember.name: PR Amount MTD Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR sales Amount]/[Measures].[Daily Target Amount]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Amount Projection
CalculatedMember.formula: ([Measures].[Gross SE Sales Amount]/[Measures].[No of MTD date])*[Measures].[No of Days Month]

CalculatedMember.name: SE Amount Projection Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[SE Amount Projection]/[Measures].[Monthly Target Amount]

CalculatedMember.name: SE MT Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales MT]/[Measures].[Monthly Target MT]

CalculatedMember.name: SE MT MTD Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[Gross SE Sales MT]/[Measures].[Daily Target MT]

CalculatedMember.name: PR MT Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR sales MT]/[Measures].[Monthly Target MT]

CalculatedMember.name: PR MT MTD Achievement
CalculatedMember.formula: [Measures].[PR sales MT]/[Measures].[Daily Target Volume]
